Save a plot with CORI defaults

Source: R/export.R
save_plot.Rd

Save a plot with CORI defaults

Usage

save_plot(
  fig,
  export_path,
  chart_width = 640,
  chart_height = 450,
  add_logo = TRUE,
  logo_path = "https://rwjf-public.s3.amazonaws.com/Logo-Mark_CORI_Black.svg",
  logo_position = "top right",
  logo_scale = 19
)

Arguments

fig

The ggplot2 figure

export_path

file path for the exported plot

chart_width

The width in px of the chart

chart_height

The height in px of the chart

add_logo

Boolean that determines if a logo is included or not

logo_path

Path to the logo. Defaults to hosted Full CORI Black logo

logo_position

Combination of top/bottom and right/left. Defaults to top right.

logo_scale

Scale logo to 1/10 width of plot

On this page
